Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed per sprint.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the impact and severity of blockers that occur.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_alignment
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for features selected in a release.

Name: minimize_budget_variance
Description: Minimize the difference between planned and actual project budget.

Name: maximize_team_stability
Description: Maximize the number of workers with high availability status.

Name: minimize_story_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the difference between estimated and actual story effort.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate at which sprint goals are successfully met.

Name: minimize_context_switching
Description: Minimize the number of different tasks a worker is assigned to in a sprint.

Name: maximize_skill_utilization
Description: Maximize the use of certified skills within the team for assigned tasks.
